title: WTB: Rube Marquard Portrait PSA 3's in different backs
author: jrlebert

posts.post_title: WTB: Rube Marquard Portrait PSA 3's in different backs
posts.post_content:
I would like to start a back run of Rube's portrait.  Looking to grab them in PSA 3 condition.  I know he is a bit expensive, but I want to give this a real shot.

Email always works, or PM's here.  Thanks!

J.R.
